Query:
SELECT
    DBARACM."DBACM_COMPANY", DBARACM."DBACM_CUSTOMER", DBARACM."DBACM_ACTIVE_STATUS", DBARACM."DBACM_SEARCH_NAME", DBARACM."DBACM_SALESMAN",
    DBARCON."DBCON_RESP_CODE", DBARCON."DBCON_NAME"
FROM
    KITTY."KITTY"."LAWDBF7"."DBARACM" DBARACM LEFT OUTER JOIN KITTY."KITTY"."LAWDBF7"."DBARCON" DBARCON ON
        DBARACM."DBACM_COMPANY" = DBARCON."DBCON_COMPANY" AND
    DBARACM."DBACM_CUSTOMER" = DBARCON."DBCON_CUSTOMER"
WHERE
    DBARACM."DBACM_ACTIVE_STATUS" <> 'I' AND
    DBARACM."DBACM_COMPANY" = 2 AND
    DBARCON."DBCON_RESP_CODE" LIKE 'E%'
ORDER BY
    DBARACM."DBACM_SALESMAN" ASC
